actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide that certain social security benefit increases provided for by Public Laws 92-336 and 92-603 be disregarded for the purposes of determining eligibility for pension or compensation under such title.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Stipulates that benefit increases under title II of the Social Security Act (Old-Age, Survivors', and Disability Insurance), provided for by Public Laws 92-326 and 92-603 be disregarded for the purposes of determining eligibility for veterans' pension or compensation. (Adds 38 U.S.C. 415 (g) (4); 503 (c))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide that certain social security benefit increases provided for by Public Laws 92-336 and 92-603 be disregarded for the purposes of determining eligibility for pension or compensation under such title.
